mapper.select: select * from review order by uno desc;
select * from review where gno=#{gno} order by regdate desc;
select * from review where uid=#{uid} order by regdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into review (gno, uid, subject, content,best,ono, image,video) values (#{gno}, #{uid}, #{subject}, #{content},#{best},#{ono},#{image},#{video})
mapper.update: update review set uid=#{uid}, subject=#{subject}, content=#{content},best=#{best} where uno=#{uno}
update review set visited=visited+1 where uno=#{uno}
update sales set review=review+1 where ono=#{ono}
